thread.title: Kris Smith Kate Fischer enter I'm A Celebrity Australia
thread.title_full: Kris Smith Kate Fischer enter I'm A Celebrity Australia | Daily Mail Online

author: Monique Friedlander For Daily Mail Australia
title: Kris Smith Kate Fischer enter I'm A Celebrity Australia
text:
I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out Of Here! welcomed two new stars to jungle during Monday night's exciting episode.
The ten unsuspecting celebrities already in camp were shocked when male model Kris Smith and the former fianc√©e of James Packer, Kate Fischer joined the fray.
The pair were seen trekking through the jungle before finally meeting up in a clearing.
Scroll down for video.
I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out Of Here! welcomed two new stars- Kate Fischer and Kris Smith to- during Monday night's exciting episode
'Oh, my God, Kris - I walked down, I see this huge man. I'm like, 'What is that?!' I didn't even know if it was a person,' quipped Kate, who now goes by the new moniker Tziporah Malkah.
Tziporah made sure to poke fun at Kris' handsomeness, telling the cameras: 'He's so horrible to look at, it's just been awful!'
It wasn't long before the pair discovered a leather-carved map directing them to the next destination.
Into the wild: The pair were seen trekking through the jungle before finally meeting up in a clearing
The adventure begins! They trudged through the wilderness before finding themselves at the foot of a hippo-infested river
They trudged through the wilderness before finding themselves at the foot of a hippo-infested river.
They then gingerly made their way across the rapids on a shanty raft.
To the delight of women everywhere, Kris promptly stripped down for the cameras before changing into his jungle attire.
Watery adventure: They then gingerly made their way across the rapids on a shanty raft
Stripping down! To the delight of women everywhere, Kris promptly stripped down for the cameras before changing into his jungle attire
'I just thought I'd get nude next, you know? My son will be watching saying, 'Put it away, Dad. You're embarrassing me,' he joked.
The pair were then met by Dr Chis Brown and Julia Morris, who introduced them to their very first tucker trial - Grotty Lottery.
Kris and Kate were promptly strapped into a spinning glass box while being showered with a concoction of local insects, including a swarm of cockroaches and crickets.
It's on! The pair were then met by Dr Chis Brown and Julia Morris, who introduced them to their very first tucker trial - Grotty Lottery
Numbered balls were also dropped into the tank, while Chris and Julia asked the pair lotto-style questions.
By the end of the challenge, Kate and Kris had earned nine meals for the camp.
The pair emerged from the glass box covered in creepy crawlies, with Kate even discovering a cockroach hiding in both ears.
Having a ball! Numbered balls were also dropped into the tank, while Chris and Julia asked the pair lotto-style questions
'I wasn't just being a sook. There was really a cockroach in my ear!' she said, disgusted.
Earlier in the episode, fans saw the celebrities blunder their way through their first day on camp.
From attempting - and failing - to work out the time without the use of technology, to struggling with emptying the long-drop bathroom, the stars were undoubtedly out of their element.
Catfishing conundrum: Next in the show, Casey opened up to the other celebrities about her notorious catfishing incident, which saw her commit to a relationship for six years despite never meeting the man
Dane and Nazeem were entrusted with the unenviable job of emptying the bathroom, leaving Ash giggling with glee from her camp bed.
'Yay, guys. The poo catchers,' she laughed.
Next in the show, Casey opened up to the other celebrities about her notorious catfishing incident, which saw her commit to a relationship for six years despite never meeting the man.
Say what? Ash was shocked by the confession
'I knew there was something wrong': She broke down in tears while speaking to the cameras in the tok-tok
Ash was shocked by the confession, telling the cameras: ' Throughout the whole time, she was being catfished by this guy for six years, and she'd never even met him. For me, I'd just... I can't fathom that sort of thing.'
Breaking down into tears, Casey told the cameras: 'It started at 16. I'd never had a boyfriend. I was always a bit different. No-one was ever interested in me. And this guy was telling me that he'd loved me.'
'I think I'd known for a while that...it wasn't real. I knew there was something wrong,' cried.
Getting political: Tension soon rose on camp when Steve and Nazeem started discussing whether Australia should ban the burka
Difference of opinion: 'I think it's preferable if we don't have that in Australian streets. I think it's quite threatening because you don't know who's wearing it,' proclaimed shock jock Steve
Tension soon rose on camp when Steve and Nazeem started discussing whether Australia should ban the burka.
'I think it's preferable if we don't have that in Australian streets. I think it's quite threatening because you don't know who's wearing it,' proclaimed shock jock Steve, to the dismay of Nazeem, who is a practising Muslim.
'When has that ever been an issue?' snapped Nazeem.
Speculating! Later in the episode, fans saw the celebrities in camp speculating about the identities of the final two stars
Surprise! Sadly for Steve, Kate swiftly descended upon the camp with her handsome counterpart
Later in the episode, fans saw the celebrities in camp speculating about the identities of the final two stars.
'I heard it was Kate Fischer,' said Nazeem, to which Steve shot back: 'For Christ's sake, do not wish that on us.'
Sadly for Steve, Kate swiftly descended upon the camp with her handsome counterpart.
The universe was listening! Single-girl Ash was delighted by the arrival of Kris, prompting some of the female campers to whisk Ash away for a quick de-brief
Single-girl Ash was delighted by the arrival of Kris, prompting some of the female campers to whisk Ash away for a quick de-brief.
'It was like the universe was listening to me and suddenly, in comes a single hottie with decent arms,' she said.
'The girls, knowing that I'm single, have all sort of rounded me up out in the foyer,' beamed Ash.
It's raining men! 'It was like the universe was listening to me and suddenly, in comes a single hottie with decent arms,' she said
Ash also found herself fixated on Kate, who recently stepped back into the spotlight after a ten-year hiatus away from the tabloids.
Kate revealed to Ash that she works night shifts at a hospital as a nurse's aid, and that she had recently been 'outed' by the media after being photographed wearing a bed-sheet in her front yard.
In response to the negative press, Kate decided to do a glamorous boudoir photo shoot in her underwear.
Interesting character: Ash also found herself fixated on Kate, who recently stepped back into the spotlight after a ten-year hiatus away from the tabloids
'Well, there's not much more you can see than underwear. Suddenly, all the paps disappeared. There was no more they could get of me,' she laughed.
'I think Tziporah's got a lot of stories that I want to hear about. And I'm pretty nosy, pretty inquisitive.
'She just seems like...she's like a Kinder Surprise. There's something cool in there,' Ash gushed.
Pure joy: Next in the episode, the celebrities were overjoyed by the arrival of their luxury items
Next in the episode, the celebrities were overjoyed by the arrival of their luxury items.
Casey brought her guitar, while Lisa enjoyed the arrival of knitting supplies.
Ash received a blow-up mattress, while Kate brought in an inflatable pink flamingo pool toy.
At the end of the episode, Chris and Julia met the celebrities at camp to deliver the news of who would compete in the next tucker trial.
Steve, Ash, Nazeem and Casey were nominated to compete.
Hope you've got a strong stomach! Steve, Ash, Nazeem and Casey were nominated to compete in the next Tucker Trial
